name: cbveu
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1

stmt.origin: bitri(weu(s0, w0), weu(s1, w1), weu(s1, wsb(s1, s0, w0)))

body.origin:
|- wb(weu(s0, w0), weu(s1, w1))
-| wb(weu(s0, w0), weu(s1, wsb(s1, s0, w0)))
-| wb(weu(s1, wsb(s1, s0, w0)), weu(s1, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(weu(s0, w0), weu(s1, w1))
-| wb(weu(s0, w0), weu(s1, wsb(s1, s0, w0)))
-| wb(weu(s1, wsb(s1, s0, w0)), weu(s1, w1))

body.origin:
|- wb(weu(s0, w0), weu(s1, wsb(s1, s0, w0)))
-| wnf(s1, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(weu(s0, w0), weu(s1, w1))
-| wb(weu(s1, wsb(s1, s0, w0)), weu(s1, w1))
-| wnf(s1, w0)

body.origin:
|- wb(weu(s1, wsb(s1, s0, w0)), weu(s1, w1))
-| wb(wsb(s1, s0, w0), w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(weu(s0, w0), weu(s1, w1))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wb(wsb(s1, s0, w0), w1)

body.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s1, s0, w0), w1)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(weu(s0, w0), weu(s1, w1))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))

comment: Rule used to change bound variables, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 25-Nov-1994.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2016.)
